item.title: Climate Modeling with Uzbek Characteristics
item.description: The week of December 15, 2025: A climate retraction, Ford’s debacle, the debt, and much, much more.

item.title: The Lesson of Judge Dugan’s Obstruction Case
item.description: The immunity that public officials need to do their jobs is not a get-out-of-jail-free card for their nonofficial acts.

item.title: Why Rescheduling Cannabis Falls Short
item.description: Federal law continues to insist that marijuana is a controlled substance — a contradiction with state laws rescheduling does not resolve.

item.title: The Bernie Sanders Plan to Sabotage the Future
item.description: We are in the equivalent of a space race, and the Vermont socialist is talking about cutting off our supply of rocket fuel.

item.title: The DNC Refuses to Learn from 2024
item.description: If they showed you their election autopsy, then you’d know what’s in it.
